Title: Allows discretion in requiring sex offender registration for persons convicted of certain sex offenses in other states
Summary: Allows discretion in requiring sex offender registration for persons convicted of certain sex offenses in other states; amends the definition of a sexually violent offense.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to allowing discretion in requiring sex offender registration for persons convicted of certain sex offenses in other states and to amend the definition of a sexually violent offense
